body:
Comment 3: 
wander.gr,

If you want something done here, it would be very useful, if you could provide exact
steps to demonstrate your problem. Perhaps, small go program that does something
unexpected in your view. You have to say what your program should do / display. Provide
steps required to setup environment for you program run and describe your environment
(OS and all). This description should be complete in a way, that, once someone made
changes to Go to make your example work, this issue will become resolved. Thank you.

Alex
